problem_definition.command_line: mpiexec ../../bin/flredecomp -i 1 -o 4 -v -l lagrangian-2nd-A lagrangian-2nd-A-flredecomp && mpiexec ../../bin/fluidity -v2 -l lagrangian-2nd-A-flredecomp.flml && mpiexec ../../bin/flredecomp -i 1 -o 4 -v -l lagrangian-2nd-B lagrangian-2nd-B-flredecomp && mpiexec ../../bin/fluidity -v2 -l lagrangian-2nd-B-flredecomp.flml && mpiexec ../../bin/flredecomp -i 1 -o 4 -v -l lagrangian-2nd-C lagrangian-2nd-C-flredecomp && mpiexec ../../bin/fluidity -v2 -l lagrangian-2nd-C-flredecomp.flml && mpiexec ../../bin/flredecomp -i 1 -o 4 -v -l lagrangian-2nd-D lagrangian-2nd-D-flredecomp && mpiexec ../../bin/fluidity -v2 -l lagrangian-2nd-D-flredecomp.flml

variables.variable:
import numpy as np from numpy import zeros,fromfile,sqrt,sum,log10 import h5py
last_locations_errora = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_A.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
g = h5py.File('bench.dat', 'r') h = 80000 idy = np.argsort(g[f'/Step#{h}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum3 = np.zeros(100) dum4 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) dum7 = np.zeros(100) dum8 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==1): dum3[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum4[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==2): dum7[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum8[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum3 = dum3[dum3 != 0] dum4 = dum4[dum4 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dum7 = dum7[dum7 != 0] dum8 = dum8[dum8 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) dummy3 = np.concatenate((dum3,dum7),axis=0) dummy4 = np.concatenate((dum4,dum8),axis=0) last_locations_errora[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errora[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4
lsa = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errora[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errora[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_a=sqrt(lsa)
last_locations_errorb = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_B.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) last_locations_errorb[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errorb[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4 lsb = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errorb[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errorb[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_b=sqrt(lsb)
ab_ratio = l2_norm_a/l2_norm_b ab_convergence = log10(ab_ratio)

import numpy as np from numpy import zeros,fromfile,sqrt,sum,log10 import h5py
last_locations_errorb = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_B.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
g = h5py.File('bench.dat', 'r') h = 80000 idy = np.argsort(g[f'/Step#{h}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum3 = np.zeros(100) dum4 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) dum7 = np.zeros(100) dum8 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==1): dum3[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum4[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==2): dum7[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum8[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum3 = dum3[dum3 != 0] dum4 = dum4[dum4 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dum7 = dum7[dum7 != 0] dum8 = dum8[dum8 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) dummy3 = np.concatenate((dum3,dum7),axis=0) dummy4 = np.concatenate((dum4,dum8),axis=0) last_locations_errorb[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errorb[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4
lsb = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errorb[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errorb[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_b=sqrt(lsb)
last_locations_errorc = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_C.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) last_locations_errorc[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errorc[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4 lsc = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errorc[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errorc[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_c=sqrt(lsc)
bc_ratio = l2_norm_b/l2_norm_c bc_convergence = log10(bc_ratio)

import numpy as np from numpy import zeros,fromfile,sqrt,sum,log10 import h5py
last_locations_errorc = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_C.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
g = h5py.File('bench.dat', 'r') h = 80000 idy = np.argsort(g[f'/Step#{h}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum3 = np.zeros(100) dum4 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) dum7 = np.zeros(100) dum8 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==1): dum3[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum4[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (g[f'/Step#{h}/proc_id'][:][idy][i]==2): dum7[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/x'][:][idy[i]] dum8[i] = g[f'/Step#{h}/y'][:][idy[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum3 = dum3[dum3 != 0] dum4 = dum4[dum4 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dum7 = dum7[dum7 != 0] dum8 = dum8[dum8 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) dummy3 = np.concatenate((dum3,dum7),axis=0) dummy4 = np.concatenate((dum4,dum8),axis=0) last_locations_errorc[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errorc[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4 lsc = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errorc[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errorc[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_c=sqrt(lsc)
last_locations_errord = zeros((2,100)) f = h5py.File('lagrangian_2nd_D.particles.Chris.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 idx = np.argsort(f[f'/Step#{n}/id'])
dum1 = np.zeros(100) dum2 = np.zeros(100) dum5 = np.zeros(100) dum6 = np.zeros(100) for i in range(100): if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==1): dum1[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum2[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] if (f[f'/Step#{n}/proc_id'][:][idx][i]==2): dum5[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/x'][:][idx[i]] dum6[i] = f[f'/Step#{n}/y'][:][idx[i]] dum1 = dum1[dum1 != 0] dum2 = dum2[dum2 != 0] dum5 = dum5[dum5 != 0] dum6 = dum6[dum6 != 0] dummy1 = np.concatenate((dum1,dum5),axis=0) dummy2 = np.concatenate((dum2,dum6),axis=0) last_locations_errord[0,:] = dummy1 - dummy3 last_locations_errord[1,:] = dummy2 - dummy4 lsd = sum(sqrt(last_locations_errord[0,:]**2 + last_locations_errord[1,:]**2)**2) l2_norm_d=sqrt(lsd)
cd_ratio = l2_norm_c/l2_norm_d cd_convergence = log10(cd_ratio)
